revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.7)
revision.text:
{{WikiProject Aerosmith|class=C|importance=high}} {{WikiProject Albums|class=C|importance=mid|b1=?|b2=?|b3=?|b4=?|b5=?|b6=?}} I'm missing [[Tom Hamilton (musician)]] on Personnel?! Is it correct, he didn't work on that album?? == Song credits for Jaded == This page says Hamilton/Tyler, but the [[Jaded (Aerosmith song)|Jaded]] page says Frederiksen/Tyler. Which one is correct? --[[User:LodeRunner|LodeRunner]] 22:25, 27 October 2006 (UTC) i beivle it was Tyler and Frederiksen, since he helped on most of the abum, and the CD manul says the same. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/66.30.52.10|66.30.52.10]] ([[User talk:66.30.52.10|talk]]) 00:51, 15 June 2008 (UTC) == Limited edition / Best Buy edition == I found a used copy of what appears to be the limited/Best Buy edition, as it has the bonus track, "Face". Face is listed on the back liner, but not in the liner notes. I can't find any mention of a video, but I've listened to the disc, and it DOES have Face on it. Also, my computer only sees a standard audio disc, with no indication of a video. Can anyone confirm that there is a version with the bonus track and a video, and that you actually either have it, or have seen it? If not, the mention of a video on this page may need to be removed. -- [[User:K1darkknight|K1darkknight]] ([[User talk:K1darkknight|talk]]) 18:47, 16 February 2009 (UTC) == Orphaned references in [[:Just Push Play]] == I check pages listed in [[:Category:Pages with incorrect ref formatting]] to try to fix reference errors. One of the things I do is look for content for [[User:AnomieBOT/docs/OrphanReferenceFixer|orphaned references]] in wikilinked articles. I have found content for some of [[:Just Push Play]]'s orphans, the problem is that I found more than one version. I can't determine which (if any) is correct for ''this'' article, so I am asking for a sentient editor to look it over and copy the correct ref content into this article. Reference named "NLD":
  • From [[Aerosmith albums discography]]: {{cite web | url=http://dutchcharts.nl/showinterpret.asp?interpret=Aerosmith | title=Discographie Aerosmith | publisher=Hung Medien | work=''dutchcharts.nl'' | accessdate=September 30, 2012 | language=Dutch}}
  • From [[Aerosmith singles discography]]: [http://dutchcharts.nl/search.asp?search=Aerosmith&cat=s Dutch peaks]
Reference named "AUS":
  • From [[Hard rock]]: {{cite book|title=Australian Chart Book 1970 - 1992|author=David Kent|isbn=0-646-11917-6|year=1993|publisher=Australian Chart Book, St Ives, N.S.W.}}
  • From [[Aerosmith albums discography]]: {{cite web | url=http://www.australian-charts.com/ | title=Australian Chart | publisher=australian-charts.com | accessdate=2008-06-24 | archiveurl= http://web.archive.org/web/20080622185559/http://australian-charts.com/| archivedate= 22 June 2008 | deadurl= no}}
  • From [[Aerosmith singles discography]]: [http://australian-charts.com/search.asp?search=Aerosmith&cat=s Australian peaks]
Reference named "allmusic":
  • From [[Honkin' on Bobo]]: http://www.allmusic.com/cg/amg.dll?p=amg&sql=10:dnfyxqqaldte
  • From [[Mick Jagger]]: {{cite web|last=Erlewine |first=Stephen Thomas |url={{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p4584|pure_url=yes}} |title=Mick Jagger Biography |publisher=Allmusic |accessdate=5 December 2010}}
  • From [[Classic Aerosmith: The Universal Masters Collection]]: {{cite web|url={{Allmusic|class=album|id=r563386|pure_url=yes}}|title=allmusic (((Classic Aerosmith: The Universal Masters Collection > Overview)))|last=Erlewine|first=Stephen Thomas|publisher=[[Allmusic]]|accessdate=23 June 2010}}
  • From [[Joe Perry (musician)]]: {{cite web | url = {{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p3508|pure_url=yes}} | title = Aerosmith Biography | work = Stephen Thomas Erlewine | publisher = Allmusic}}
  • From [[Aerosmith singles discography]]: {{cite web|url={{Allmusic|class=artist |id=p604952/charts-awards/billboard-singles |pure_url=yes}} |title=Aerosmith - Awards |publisher=AllMusic |date= |accessdate=2012-06-26}}
  • From [[Aerosmith]]: {{cite web | url = {{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p3508|pure_url=yes}} | title = Aerosmith Biography |author = Stephen Thomas Erlewine | publisher = Allmusic}}
  • From [[Diane Warren]]: {{cite web|url=http://www.allmusic.com/artist/diane-warren-mn0000584360/biography|title=Diane Warren - Biography|work=[[AllMusic]]|accessdate=July 15, 2014}}
  • From [[Lord of the Thighs]]: {{cite web|title=Lord of the Thighs|url={{Allmusic|class=song|id=t841871|pure_url=yes}}|publisher=[[allmusic]]|accessdate=2009-06-18}}
Reference named "British Hit Singles & Albums":
  • From [[Aerosmith singles discography]]: {{cite book| first= David| last=Roberts| year= 2006| title= British Hit Singles & Albums| edition= 19th| publisher= Guinness World Records Limited | location= London| isbn= 1-904994-10-5| page= 157}}
  • From [[Mick Jagger]]: {{cite book | first= David | last= Roberts | year= 2006 | title= British Hit Singles & Albums | edition= 19th | publisher=Guinness World Records Limited | location= London | isbn= 1-904994-10-5 | page= 277}}
Reference named "GER":
  • From [[Aerosmith singles discography]]: [http://www.officialcharts.de/suche.asp?search=Aerosmith&x=0&y=0&country=de&kategorie=single German peaks]
  • From [[Aerosmith albums discography]]: {{cite web | url=http://www.charts-surfer.de/musiksearch.php | title=German Chart | publisher=Charts-Surfer | accessdate=2008-06-24 }} {{Dead link|date=October 2010|bot=H3llBot}}
I apologize if any of the above are effectively identical; I am just a simple computer program, so I can't determine whether minor differences are significant or not. [[User:AnomieBOT|AnomieBOT]][[User talk:AnomieBOT|⚡]] 20:51, 14 November 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:10|one external link|10 external links}} on [[Just Push Play]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=748808806 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20121024145946/http://australian-charts.com/showitem.asp?interpret=Aerosmith&titel=Just+Push+Play&cat=a to http://australian-charts.com/showitem.asp?interpret=Aerosmith&titel=Just+Push+Play&cat=a *Added archive http://www.dutchcharts.nl/showitem.asp?interpret=Aerosmith&titel=Just+Push+Play&cat=a *Added archive http://www.abpd.org.br/certificados_interna.asp When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation
